## `PersistCookies`

Toggles whether the web harvester uses keeps cookies read from JavaScript between harvests.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
PersistCookies(bool keepCookies)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`bool` keepCookies | `true` to keep cookies between harvesting sessions. |
